item.description:
SAT OCT 17 at 8pm Galactic Bowling Nite at Bradley Bowl

Join Central CT Singles at Bradley Bowl for a great evening of Bowling and New Friends

UNLIMITED Galactic Bowling from 8 pm to Closing Shoes, Soda, and Snacks Music, and Light Show are included

- $50 worth of Bowling, Shoe Rentals, Food and Soda (plus prizes) for only $15
- save $5 and get your ticket in advance for only $10

Watch us transform the bowling center into party central with glowing black lights, special effect lighting, and state of the art sound system. …it’s a whole new game!

Bradley Bowl
129 Ella Grasso Turnpike
Windsor Locks, CT 06096

ACROSS FROM BRADLEY INTL AIRPORT

JOIN THE PARTY! MEET LOCAL SINGLES AND PARTY WITH CENTRAL CT SINGLES

Advance Tickets are only $10 online at www.CentralCTSingles.com
Tickets at the event are $15

RECESSION BUSTER – Only $10 Online or $15 At The Event

SPACE IS LIMITED - RESERVE YOUR SPOT TODAY

UPCOMING EVENTS

Wednesday Oct 14 * 7pm
Professional Singles Nite with Magic Table-7pm in the Melody Lane Party Room
AGE RANGE- 30's * 40's * 50's Cherry Street Restaurant 428 S Cherry Street Wallingford, CT 06492 * Recession Buster: ADV TIX $10 * $15 at door

Wednesday Oct 21 * 7pm
Monster Mini Golf Nite 18 Holes of indoor glow in the dark Monster themed fun, arcade, and games Monster Mini Golf 20 Main St. (Dexter Plaza) Windsor Locks, CT 06096 * Recession Buster: ADV TIX $10 * $15 at door
Saturday October 24 * 8 pm
CLUB SWING with the CT Theatre Group Bushnell Theatre
166 Capitol Avenue Hartford, CT 06106 Get your ADV TIX at our Group Discount Rate

Friday Oct 30 Mohegan Sun Party Bus includes Buffet, $20 $$ + Concert with JOURNEY Tribute
Pickup in South Windsor, Windsor, Glastonbury and Norwich * ADV TIX only $25

Saturday Oct 31 * 8 pm
Galactic Bowling Nite at Spare Time Bristol
- UNLIMTED BOWLING, Snacks, Soda- includes Shoes Spare Time Bristol 177 Farmington Ave (Route 6) Bristol, CT 06010 * Recession Buster: ADV TIX $10 * $15 at door

Sunday Nov 1 * 7 pm
Sunday Nite Dance Party-7pm in the Melody Lane Party Room AGE RANGE- 30's * 40's * 50's
Cherry Street Restaurant 428 S Cherry Street Wallingford, CT 06492
Recession Buster: ADV TIX $7.50 $10 at door includes Appetizers

Saturday Nov 7 * 8 pm
Galactic Bowling Nite at Spare Time Vernon - UNLIMTED BOWLING, Snacks, Soda- includes Shoes
Spare Time Vernon 350 Talcottville Rd (Route 83) Vernon, CT 06066 * Recession Buster: ADV TIX $10 * $15 at door
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the Central CT Singles signs

group.name: CTMatch Singles Events Music Dance Speed Dating Golf Comedy
